text: Navu malak‌galodane, ‘‘adamarige sastangaveragiri’’ endaga avaru sastangaveragidaru – adare iblisana horatu. Avanu jinn‌gala salige seriddanu mattu avanu tanna odeyana adesavannu miri nadedanu. Avanu nim'ma satruvagiruvaga nivenu, nannannu bittu, avanannu hagu avana santatiyannu nim'ma posakaragisikolluvira? Akramigalige bahala ketta phala sigalide
